item.title: Break
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:5, topic:135873”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=187358.msg1693355#msg1693355 date=1187835596]

Work on;
Lighting
Depth
Backgrounds
Text
Colors
ect. ect. the same things I tell you every time.

3/10

so your saying he got worse? lol i think he is geting better… i have seen you rate ones worse then this higher then you rated this one.
[/quote]
thats exe, i need a better light source >.>[/quote]I said what I said because its true, this is worse than what I’ve seen recently, and even worse than all those brushed signatures. This fails at art tbh, why don’t you try practicing making art without posting the outcome for awhile, and see where you end up. Every time you post and ask for C&C you get the same answers and do the same thing again.

Read full topic
